title: Have you known somebody who never gives up but end up failing? - Quora

response.answer_text: I want to answer this question because it relates to me. I am sort of person who never think before try the new things to get best experience of learning, however whenever I tried I failed in first attempt but you know what I failed I came to know that the mistake was not try but it was with wrong way or something sort feedback. I never call it failure but I called it feedback. In the second attempt I used to make it perfect. “Keep trying”
it is really none of your business. People have aright to try for themselves without input from others.
